name: International Glutamate Technical Committee
goal: The IGTC is an international not-for-profit organization dedicated to the support of scientific research to expand the large and growing body of knowledge about the biochemistry/metabolism, physiology, pharmacology and toxicology of glutamic acid.
interests: Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Food additive re-evaluation, food additive regulation, EFSA transparency initiatives, research funding
